Description: Navigate to the login credentials section on the home page. Login to the page using the provided credentials. After successful login, verify that you are on the home page.
Test Steps:

Step 2: Click on div 'login credentials'
Step 3: Login
Step 4: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
